# zoomFactor

**Instance Property**

A zoom factor.

## Declaration

```swift
var zoomFactor: Float { get }
```

## Discussion

Suitable for use with the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/videoZoomFactor] property or [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/ramp(toVideoZoomFactor:withRate:)].

## Inspecting a framing

- **aspectRatio**: An aspect ratio.
title: zoomFactor
